content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" CONTENTS:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I. GENERAL PART\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"II. OCCUPATIONAL RISK FACTORS AND SAFETY MEASURES\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"III. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE BEFORE WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE DURING WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"V. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE IN EMERGENCY (SPECIAL) SITUATIONS\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VI. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE AFTER WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I. GENERAL PART\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tThis Guide sets out the general health and safety requirements for all administrative staff of the Company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees may work independently if they are:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.1. theoretically and practically trained to work safely in accordance with the procedures laid down by the Company;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.2. have passed a health check in accordance with the risk factors specified for the position and the workplace (at the frequency specified in the health check schedule);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.3. duly instructed: have listened to the introductory, initial and periodic briefings introductions of occupational safety and health, fire safety and at the workplace.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees must:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.1. observe the workplace regulations, protect and take care of his own and other employees’ health and his actions related (or unrelated) to the work carried out under the contract, avoid creating dangerous conditions for himself and other employees, and avoid actions that could lead to an accident or fire;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.2. be able to work safely, and be aware of and comply with the requirements of this Guide and other safety and health, civil protection, fire safety, hygiene and environmental protection instructions and other legal acts of the Company;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.3. observe the rules governing the use of the work equipment with which they work;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.4. not work with work equipment that is not in good working order;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.5. use work tools and equipment for their intended purpose;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.6. ensure that safety equipment, tools, appliances, fire extinguishers and occupational safety documentation are completed and maintained in their workplace;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.7. keep their work area clean and tidy;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.8. make proper use of collective and personal protective equipment at all times in accordance with the work to be carried out and the equipment to be used; \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.9. follow the supervisor’s instructions and carry out only the work for the performance of which they have been assigned and instructed and only when they personally know how to perform the work in a safe manner. If the employees have any doubts, they should ask their supervisor to explain how to carry out the task safely, and starting the work should only be allowed after receiving full explanations;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.10. report any identified deficiencies to the supervisor, the occupational safety and health officer or the employees’ representative;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.11. know how to administer first aid, how to separate the injured person from electrical current and provide first aid;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.12. be sober and not under the influence of alcohol, narcotic drugs, toxic and other psychoactive substances;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.13. in the event of a rise in the body temperature or acute signs of illness report to the supervisor and seek medical attention;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.14. report any observed hazards to the safety and health of employees and any malfunctions, disturbances or faults in work equipment and tools to the supervisor, the occupational safety and health officer or the employees’ representative. Troubleshooting of electrical failures may be carried out by a qualified electrical engineering technician.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The employee may refuse to work, and work must also be stopped if the supervisor does not take the necessary measures to remedy the irregularities and to protect the employee from potential danger in these cases:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.1. the employee has not been trained to work safely;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.2. the work continues in the event of a breakdown of work equipment or in emergency situation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.3. work in violation of the requirements of this Guide;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.4. failure to provide the employee with personal protective equipment;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.5. in other cases where the working environment is hazardous and/or dangerous to health or life.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.\\tWhen work is interrupted, immediately report the reasons for refusal to work to the supervisor and occupational safety and health specialists. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal hygiene requirements:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.1. do not touch the face or other parts of the body with dirty hands;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.2. do not keep, eat food or drink in the workplace;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.3. wear clean work clothes;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.4. wash hands with clean water and soap before breaks.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.\\tThe employee who violates the requirements of this Guide shall be subject to disciplinary, financial, administrative and criminal liability established by laws of the Republic of Lithuania, depending on the nature and consequences of the violation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"II. OCCUPATIONAL RISK FACTORS AND SAFETY MEASURES\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dangerous occupational risk factors and safety walking\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use of work equipment for its intended purpose (do not use an office chair with wheels for reaching, do not swing on the chair, etc.)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" operation of ventilation, heating/air conditioning systems\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/38b0a0e9-415d-4804-bc1c-94816e18c2f9/33.jpg?preview=true\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":118,\"height\":118},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Lighting \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(workstation lighting should comply with the visual work category)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3d9dfb2b-8d74-4005-9885-05906631d666/44.jpg?preview=true\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3d9dfb2b-8d74-4005-9885-05906631d666/44.jpg?preview=true\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":124,\"height\":127},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ensuring minimum illumination value depending on the nature of the work \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Electricity exposure causes electric shock to the body leading to spasmodic contraction of muscles and damage to internal vital organs. The greatest risk of exposure to electricity arises when:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.1. the employee is in touch contact with structural elements or housing of electrical equipment in which voltage arises due to damaged insulation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.2. the employee is in step-to-step contact with the places where electric current flows, at connection points with the ground (e.g., when wires break and fall, “step voltage”). A person is exposed to the so-called “step voltage” when being near a fallen wire he takes a step and his both feet are on the ground at two points with different potentials because the current flows through the feet. The person’s legs convulse, he falls down and becomes exposed to an even greater voltage. This can be avoided by placing the feet close and leaving the danger zone either jumping on one foot or placing the foot close to the other.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.\\tElectrical current impact on the body depends on the strength of the current, the path of flow through the body flows and the duration of exposure. The strength of the current depends on the voltage and conductor (resistance of the body, which depends on the dryness of the skin, insobriety, fatigue, etc.). The higher the resistance of the body and safety devices, the less current passes through it. The resistance is increased by dry hands.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.\\tSpecific hazardous and harmful factors affecting workers at the workplace are listed in the occupational safety and health instructions according to professions and works performed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"III. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE BEFORE WORK\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"13. Check visually whether the lighting at the workstation is sufficient.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.\\tInspect the worksite and remove unnecessary items that may interfere with the work.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15.\\tCheck that floors are in good order (there are no cracks, the flows are dry, slip-resistant, free of obstructions) and that walkways are not obstructed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.\\tCheck that binders and items placed on shelves, in cabinets, on tables are stable and will not fall off.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Visually check the condition of electrical equipment at the worksite whether:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17.1. the live contacts of the electrical panel or equipment are covered;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17.2. the plug of the electrical cable and the socket where the equipment is plugged are in good working order;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17.3. the wiring connecting the equipment to the mains does not come into contact with hot, wet surfaces, other cables, sharp edges, other earthed equipment;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17.4. wiring is protected against accidental mechanical damages. Wires/cables should be plugged into sockets in a manner ensuring that they will not be stepped on or stumbled over.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"18.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not work with an electrical equipment or appliance if:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"18.1. the impact of electric current is felt when touched;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"18.2. electrical cable is damaged, electrical plugs, sockets are not in good order, smoke has appeared or there is a characteristic smell of burning insulation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"18.3. liquids have been spilled onto it. Never touch electric wires, cables, plugs, electrical equipment or appliance with wet hands;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.\\tIf any failure, disorder or risk factor is observed, the employee must remove the dangerous factor to the extent possible and according to his competence, otherwise report to the supervisor.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20.\\tDo not start working until all deficiencies have been remedied.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE DURING WORK\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"21.\\tKeep on the table only those documents and equipment that is necessary for the work. Maintain the worksite tidy and clean.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.\\tUse all equipment and devices at the worksite only for their intended purpose.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"23.\\tDo not use electrical equipment that is in poor order (broken housing, torn insulation of wires, removed protective covers, etc.). Do not touch electrical wires without insulation and electrical contacts and do not take power supply wires with hands.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"24.\\t Do not use a device that produces sparks. Immediately disconnect it from the mains.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"25.\\tDo not use self-made heating tools with open heating coils.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"26.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The power supply must be cut-off and electrical repair staff must be called when:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"26.1. there are electrical installation faults (broken or sparking socket, circuit breaker, etc.);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"26.2. a smell of burning wires is felt;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"26.3. electrical wires are hot;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"26.4. there is power outage (but only if the cut-off switch or its cut-off position is known).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"27.\\tWhen staying in industrial units, at construction sites, near equipment, follow the posted safety signs and wear personal protective equipment shown on them.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"28.\\tDo not touch unknown chemicals or other substances. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"29.\\tFloors (working surfaces) must be smooth and dry. Spills must be cleaned immediately. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"30.\\tDo not lift or carry a load that does not meet your physical fitness. Do not push or pull objects of unknown mass without the need.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"31.\\tIt is possible to lift 30 kg by hand (lifting one load) for men and 10 kg for women. The lifting and transport of heavier goods requires the use of mechanisms or the lifting of the load by two people (coordinating actions with each other).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"32.\\tIn all cases where manual lifting may pose a risk to safety and health, the respective technical means shall be used where possible and appropriate. When using technical means for lifting loads the stability of the load must be ensured and their use should not give rise to additional risks and dangerous factors.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While walking:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.1. pedestrians must walk on pavements or footpaths on the right-hand side and, where there are no pavements or footpaths, on the kerb. Where there is no pavement, footpath or kerb, or where it is not possible to walk on it, walking in a single file along the carriageway side is possible;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.2. pedestrians walking on the kerb or side of the carriageway should walk in the direction allowing to see the oncoming traffic;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.3. while walking on a roadway in the company’s territory where vehicles are passing, care must be taken to stop and wait for the vehicles to pass, as this may cause the load to trip or become stuck against a building or other fixed object;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.4. avoid running suddenly into the carriageway from behind the building or vehicle which stopped;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.5. be particularly careful when passing through the places where loading of goods takes place – unloading by inland transport. Do not enter or stay under the load lifted by the truck, it is necessary to wait until the loading and unloading operations have been completed or to pass the area where the loading operations are carried out at a safe distance;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.6. be careful when crossing the territory of the company in the event of slippery road surfaces;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.7. be extremely careful when leaving invisible areas (from behind stacks, doors, etc.) to the road along which internal vehicles move;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.8. do not walk or climb in walkways that are cluttered or obstructed;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.9. while walking watch out for road unevenness, uneven floor coverings, wires and other similar obstacles. Watch out for doorsteps walking through the door;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.10. while walking, avoid stepping on sharp objects, colliding with moving or stationary objects or slipping;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.11. climb stairs carefully and holding on to handrails.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"V. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE IN EMERGENCY (SPECIAL) SITUATIONS\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"34.\\tIf there are any signs of a potential accident or emergency, stop work immediately, leave and encourage other workers to leave the danger area and inform the supervisor.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"35.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the event of an accident:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"35.1. Provide the injured person with immediate first aid and call an ambulance.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"35.2. The person who has suffered the accident, if possible, should immediately report the accident to the supervisor or other person authorised by the employer. A person who witnesses or learns about the accident must immediately provide first aid to the injured person and report the accident to the responsible staff.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"35.3. Keep the worksite and equipment in the condition as it was at the time of the accident until the accident is investigated. If this endangers the life and health of employees in the vicinity, only minor changes may be made which must be recorded in a particular manner (written and graphical, photographed, filmed). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"36.\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\tIn the event of electrical injury, the employee must:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"36.1. immediately separate the victim from the impact of the electric current by turning the power off;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"36.2. If this is not possible, immediately remove the injured person from the exposure area, but only if this can be done in a safe manner (take all possible measures to protect from electrical shock). When pulling the injured person away, avoid touching adjacent metal objects and exposed parts of the injured person’s body. If touching exposed parts of the injured person’s body is necessary, insulate your hands with dielectric gloves, scarf, hat, etc., or place a rubber mat, rubber material, etc., under your feet.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"37.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the event of fire:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"37.1. alert nearby employees, inform the person in charge of the incident and call the fire brigade by the general emergency number 112;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"37.2. remain calm and composed and reasonably assess the existing situation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"37.3. extinguish the fire with the available primary fire extinguishing equipment (fire extinguisher, water, covering with non-flammable material);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"37.4. extinguish low-voltage (up to 1000 V) electrical installations with powder and gas (CO2) extinguishers;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"38.\\tIn the event of other emergencies, remain calm, do not panic and leave the area of exposure to hazardous factors.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VI. ACTIONS OF THE EMPLOYEE AFTER WORK\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"39.\\tTidy up the work area.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"40.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After work, the employee must check that:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"40.1. there is no smell of gas, flammable and other unusual specific smell in the room;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"40.2. electrical equipment, indoor lighting, which must be switched off after work are switch off;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"40.3. windows and other openings are closed;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"40.4. no people remain.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"41.\\tThe employee who notices any violations of the above requirements must take measures to eliminate them and if this is not possible – report to the supervisor.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
